msg: fancy reporting code pulled from httpunit. Nb, why is the test reporting dir not under build/ ? seems to me it is another artifact that clean should clean up.

author: stevel
msg: add a double check for nullity of engine as the sync block will have killed the ref if it blocked.

author: stevel

author: stevel
msg: this doesnt guarantee thread safety on axis engine cleanup handlers, but it reduces the window; it is only if cleanup is called more than once simultaneousy that trouble can happen, rather than sequentially.
yes I do have an MP cpu on my desk, no I havent got a good test for this cleanup yet.
